name: Trial by Combat
description:
WARNING: MIGHT BE BUGGY (Restart if anything breaks)

a game of boss fights!  made for the "Ready Set Jam" hosted by Vimlark

designed 4 different boss fights but due to the time constraint of the jam wasn't able to get about 1.5 of the bosses i wanted to do.

Controls (Keyboard / Gamepad)
  • WASD / Arrow Keys -  Move & Aim attacks.
  • J /  A Button - to Jump
  • K / X Button - Sword Attack
  • L  / B Button - To Shield from Attacks
